Imaginative_Complaint: As a 30-year-old male, I’ve recently started experiencing fever, cough, fatigue over the last couple of days. It’s starting to worry me because I’ve never felt this weak before. I suspect it could be gastroenteritis, but I’m not sure. My blood pressure is high and cholesterol is high.
